30#include <sys/cdefs.h>
31__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: i915_gem_debug.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:23 riastradh Exp $");
32
33#include <drm/drmP.h>
34#include <drm/i915_drm.h>
35#include "i915_drv.h"
36
37#if WATCH_LISTS
38int
39i915_verify_lists(struct drm_device *dev)
40{
41 static int warned;
42 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = to_i915(dev);
43 struct drm_i915_gem_object *obj;
44 struct intel_engine_cs *ring;
45 int err = 0;
46 int i;
47
48 if (warned)
49 return 0;
50
51 for_each_ring(ring, dev_priv, i) {
52 list_for_each_entry(obj, &ring->active_list, ring_list[ring->id]) {
53 if (obj->base.dev != dev ||
54 !atomic_read(&obj->base.refcount.refcount)) {
55 DRM_ERROR("%s: freed active obj %p\n",
56 ring->name, obj);
57 err++;
58 break;
59 } else if (!obj->active ||
60 obj->last_read_req[ring->id] == NULL) {
61 DRM_ERROR("%s: invalid active obj %p\n",
62 ring->name, obj);
63 err++;
64 } else if (obj->base.write_domain) {
65 DRM_ERROR("%s: invalid write obj %p (w %x)\n",
66 ring->name,
67 obj, obj->base.write_domain);
68 err++;
69 }
70 }
71 }
72
73 return warned = err;
74}
75#endif /* WATCH_LIST */
76
